org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text

Interface TextContentVariants

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeContainer, TextContent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphemeElement, TextObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Glyph, Grapheme, GraphemeElementImpl, GraphemeGroup, LowLevelTextObject, NonPrintingCharacter, TextLine, TextRegion, Word

    public interface TextContentVariants
extends TextContent
    Interface for text objects with multiple text content variants.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextContent addTextContentVariant()
      Adds a new text content variant
      TextContent getTextContentVariant(int index)
      Returns the text content variant for the given index
      int getTextContentVariantCount()
      Returns the number of text content variants.
      void reomveTextContentVariant(int index)
      Removes the text content variant at the given index, if there are two or more variants.

    • Method Detail

      • getTextContentVariantCount

        int getTextContentVariantCount()
        Returns the number of text content variants.
        Returns:
        Count >= 1

      • getTextContentVariant

        TextContent getTextContentVariant(int index)
        Returns the text content variant for the given index
        Returns:
        Text content object

      • addTextContentVariant

        TextContent addTextContentVariant()
        Adds a new text content variant
        Returns:
        The new text content object

      • reomveTextContentVariant

        void reomveTextContentVariant(int index)
        Removes the text content variant at the given index, if there are two or more variants. One text content variant has to exist at all times.
